customizer package¶

Submodules¶

customizer.start module¶

Ubuntu Customizer.

This module demonstrates how to automatically configure Ubuntu via Python script. Usage:

$ sudo python start.py

class customizer.start.UbuntuCustomizer[source]¶

Bases: object

A class to automatically configure Ubuntu.

It needs sudo-mode for configure correctly.
